name: Mejai's Soulstealer
simpleDescription: Grants Ability Power for kills and assists

passives.name: Glory
passives.effects: Gain 4 stacks for each champion kill and 2 stacks for each assist, up to a maximum of 25 stacks. For every stack, gain 5 ability power, up to 125% attack speed at maximum stacks. If you have at least 10 stacks, also gain 10% bonus movement speed. Lose 10 stacks on death. Stacks are preserved from {{ii|Dark Seal}}.
